name: Thomas: The Shank Engine
description:
One night, you fall asleep waiting for the train, beside you, is a VHS that you've never seen before. 

....What's on the tape?

Thomas : The Shank Engine
(VHS 2)

Shroudy Software

https://www.shroudysoftware.com/

WASD + Mouse

Shift to sprint (limited)

Esc to ESCAPE

Credits will signify the end

*subject to random updates of content and/or horror

Updates:
12/22/2021
- Patched crash logic post button press
- Raised panel for user input (a bit better)
- Dialed in the radio for less ear-hurt
